Practice: One-Step Equation Gauntlet

Solve as many as you can!

Level 1: Addition (Solve for x)

x + 5 = 10

x + 3 = 7

x + 9 = 12

x + 1 = 11

x + 15 = 25

x + 7 = 19

Level 2: Subtraction (Solve for y)

y - 2 = 8

y - 10 = 5

y - 7 = 13

y - 1 = 9

y - 20 = 30

y - 6 = 14

Level 3: Multiplication (Solve for a)

2a = 12

5a = 25

3a = 15

10a = 100

4a = 24

6a = 42

Level 4: Division (Solve for b)

b / 3 = 5

b / 2 = 10

b / 6 = 6

b / 8 = 4

b / 5 = 7

b / 10 = 2

🧺 Te Kete Ako

"Whaowhia te kete mātauranga"

Fill the basket of knowledge

Quality teaching resources for Aotearoa New Zealand educators, honoring mātauranga Māori and contemporary pedagogy.
